author: masterChef
intro: Make southern style mashed potatos at home!
ingredients: 2 pounds baking potatoes, peeled and quartered
3 cloves garlic, peeled, or to taste (Optional)
salt and ground black pepper to taste

directions.1: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
directions.2: Add potatoes and garlic, lower heat to medium, and simmer until potatoes are tender, 15 to 20 minutes.
directions.3: When the potatoes are almost finished, heat milk and butter in a small saucepan over low heat until butter is melted.
directions.4: Drain potatoes and return to the pot.
directions.5: Slowly add warm milk mixture, blending it in with a potato masher or electric mixer until potatoes are smooth and creamy.
